page.title: 20FUTURE OF WYCHWOOD - THANKS
page.content: {Wychwood Forest }is a valuable { {reservoir of native flora and fauna.} The forest environment can only be { {preserved }through sympathetic {reaf- {forestation }and active {conservation} of the wildlife. The {Ramblers' Assoc- {iation's pressure }is mounting for unrestricted access to forest paths and receives favourable publicity. In fact the{Nature Conservancy allow con- {trolled access }by permit to many interested groups and schools. { {Limited access protects the Forest's {treasures. }Change could lead to abuse and destruction. Our {thanks} to the {people of {Finstock, the Nature Conservancy and {Cornbury Estate }for information and help. Also to {Jean Walker }for her computer and coffee! {Stella Marks Robin Butler {Ramsden W.I. August l985.}
